summary: A mod based on MCM , change worn armor \'s nif to another nif temporarily.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
Sorry for my terrible english first.

This mod is based on MCM,thanks to SkyUI Team.

As we know, what a armor looks like depends on its nif files & textures. 
this mod offers a mcm panel to record player\'s current worn armor\'s nif  filepath,then aplly the nif to another armor.
there are 3 custom presets and 8 empty solts to record nif filepath.

Support armor(body,hands&feet,no head) which has single armoraddon part & without textsets in esp only.
the effect will last until quit game.

Requirement:
SKYUI 3.1+ and SKSE 1.6.9+ are required.

Usage:
press \"Esc\"key and select \"MOD CONFIGURATION\",then u can see Nifswitch menu.
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33175-1-1363059283.jpg[/img]
A- manual record filepath
1.click filepath in left panel to record worn-armor\'s nif file.
2.select a nif form  list menu  by click \"select a nif\" button in right  panel\'s to replace current worn.

B-custom filepath
1.copy your nif files into \\Meshes\\custom\\ ,then rename them as :
                 1body_1.nif  2body_1.nif 3body_1.nif  
                 1feet_1.nif  2feet_1.nif 3feet_1.nif  
                 1hand_1.nif  2hand_1.nif  3hand_1.nif
2.select a custom nif form list menu  by click \"select a nif\" button in right  panel\'s to replace current worn.

Install & Uninstall:
NMM or any other mod manger is ok.
author: ruinelec
